pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes radio and television scripts for Theatre Guild on the Air (a.k.a. U.S. Steel Hour), plus correspondence and other papers. Also includes non radio related Theatre Guild papers. Scripts are stored in 125 boxes, arranged alphabetically by title. Correspondence is arranged alphabetically. Note: Sound recordings of the programs are in the Music Library.
